# `gg`

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This tool is still a POC so expect rough edges. ðŸ˜…

**https://gg-charts.com** is a light **software architecture simulator** for documentation and presentation purposes.

It aims to help you define any kind of software architecture and produce step-by-step presentations of various usage scenarios.

![preview](./screenshot.gif)

([edit me](https://gg-charts.com/#autoplay=true&))

## Examples

- [The architecture of this app](https://gg-charts.com/#autoplay=true&)
- [How Redux works](https://gg-charts.com/#autoplay=true&) (inspired by [their documentation](https://redux.js.org/tutorials/fundamentals/part-2-concepts-data-flow#redux-application-data-flow))

## Development

1. Clone this repository.
2. Run:

```sh
npm install
npm run dev
```
